reviews.review_msg: put him on the goat level with jamie and monogan. very fun class

I took vijay at Langara college for math1152. He is a VERY unorganized guy. He forgot we had quizzes multiply times. He takes days to reply to emails & if you speak with him in person he apologizes then forgets to do what you asked for. HE MESSED UP PROBLEMS EVERY CLASS. He doesn't even know what he's teaching and the students would correct him.
